```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
devtools::load_all(".")
source('../code/plot.R')
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F, include=F}
chord = c(60) %>% mami.codi(
  spatial_tolerance = 0.1,
  verbose=T, 
  num_harmonics=10
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  consonance_dissonance, 
  major_minor
)
```

#### Temporal

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  temporal_gcn,
  temporal_lcd,
  temporal_consonance
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord$temporal_ratios[[1]]
```

#### Spatial

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord %>% dplyr::select(
  spatial_gcn,
  spatial_lcd,
  spatial_consonance
)
```

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
chord$spatial_ratios[[1]]
```
